description.full: This class is integrated into the openframeworks events system. When a resize event happens we record window size information inside an object of the class. Used to send event messages. In the new openFrameworks release we can find a very illustrative example about how to use events in openFrameworks.

methods.name: ofResizeEventArgs
methods.parameters: int width, int height

page.document:
#class ofResizeEventArgs

<!-- visible: True advanced: False istemplated: False extends: ofEventArgs -->

##InlineDescription

##Description

This class is integrated into the openframeworks events system. When a resize event happens we record window size information inside an object of the class. Used to send event messages. In the new openFrameworks release we can find a very illustrative example about how to use events in openFrameworks.

#class ofResizeEventArgs


<!--

##InlineDescription






##Description

This class is integrated into the openframeworks events system. When a resize event happens we record window size information inside an object of the class. Used to send event messages. In the new openFrameworks release we can find a very illustrative example about how to use events in openFrameworks.
